biography.summary: Ron Wyden is a United States Senator from Oregon, first elected to the Senate in 1996. A Democrat, he has focused on health care, tax reform, privacy, and government transparency, and has served on key committees including the Senate Finance Committee as Ranking Member.

contact.office_address: 221 Dirksen Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

committees.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

policy_positions.stance: Supports expanding access and pursuing a public option as part of health care reform.
Advocates for privacy protections and reform of surveillance authorities.
